nodes.text: Silver Bull was a container transport operated by the Galactic Empire.

Shortly before the Battle of Hoth, it was assigned to rendezvous with Lambda-class T-4a shuttle Aluma to transfer a VIP scientist at the SpecWar Fab Deep Space Manufacturing Facility. Both Rebel Alliance and Demetrius Zaarin's forces attacked the rendezvous and were thwarted by an Imperial Missile Boat.
